title: The Xiaomi IPO
heading: Season 3, Episode 2
description: Acquired kicks off our China tech mini-series by teaming up with the best in the business: Hans and Zara from GGV's 996 Podcast! Together we cover the largest technology IPO in the world since fellow China tech giant Alibaba in 2014: Xiaomi, where Hans has been an investor and board member from the very beginning. This episode is chock full of history and insight on both Xiaomi and what's happening in China tech more broadly, and why we all should be paying attention. No matter where you live, this is definitely not one to miss!
